Novotel
Hotel that makes every moment matter
Experience a refreshing stay at Novotel Visakhapatnam, while enjoying spectacular views of the dazzling Bay of Bengal. Equipped with amazing facilities, peerless services and ethos of hospitality, this 5 star hotel is best suited for both business trips and a leisure stay.

The Gateway Hotel
Perfect seaside retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life
Close to the industrial hub, The Gateway hotel in Visakhapatnam is the perfect seaside retreat to unwind. Smart spacious rooms with modern amenities and panoramic views of the spectacular Bay of Bengal make The Gateway Hotel Visakhapatnam a sought-after business hotel in the city.

A combination of modern comfort and urban convenience
Four Points By Sheraton Visakhapatnam welcomes worldwide guests with typical Indian hospitality. The hotel is blessed with sprawling ambiance where the occurrence of contemporary infrastructure ensures relaxed staying environment for the voyagers.
